description:
This plugin hides the "We just updated this page..." warning every time you change something on your app. Use this if you don't want your users to see this warning every time you update your app, but don't want to have a lot of refreshes happening.

If you want to always keep you app updated, check out this plugin:
https://bubble.io/plugin/auto-refresh---reload-on-update-1746408768825x222941948715204600
name: Hide update warning
plugin_instructions:
No action is needed. The plugin adds a script on all your pages automatically.

Please report any bug or suggestion to:
gustavohrmotta@gmail.com
